seo.title: HeyMou | Your Technology Ally - Strategy, Design & Development
seo.description: HeyMou - I transform ambitious ideas into tangible results through technology. Your technology ally for strategy, design and development that connects with your audience.
seo.keywords: HeyMou, Moises, Mou, technology ally, web development, automation, digital strategy, Next.js, BuildShip, UX/UI design, entrepreneurs

hero.title: Your ideas deserve a
hero.subtitle: Hi, I'm Mois√©s. (You can call me Mou) For over 15 years I have focused on transforming ambitious ideas into tangible results through technology, strategy, design and development that connects with your audience.

servicesSection.title: Your Comprehensive Technology Ally
servicesSection.subtitle: From idea to implementation, I accompany you every step of the way. Strategy, design and development that transforms dreams into digital reality.

items.title: Strategy & Consulting
items.description: I transform your vision into an executable plan. As your technology ally, I deeply analyze your business to create clear roadmaps and intelligent decisions.

items.title: Design & Experience
items.description: Interfaces that emotionally connect with your audience. User-centered design that converts visitors into loyal and engaged customers.

items.title: Development & Automation
items.description: Clean, scalable and efficient code that grows with you. Full-stack development and intelligent integrations that power and automate your business.

cta.question: Ready to transform your dream into digital reality?

successStoriesSection.title: Stories that Inspire
successStoriesSection.subtitle: Every project is a transformation story. Discover how other entrepreneurs have materialized their technological ideas alongside their ideal technology ally.

stories.title: Camino el Portal del Alma
stories.challenge: Needed to improve the user experience of her spiritual portal and optimize usability to better connect with her audience.
stories.solution: We implemented significant WordPress improvements focused on UX/UI and continuous technical support to optimize user experience.

testimonial.quote: The transformation of my portal was incredible. Now my users navigate intuitively and connect deeply with the spiritual content.
testimonial.author: Roxana Della Croce
testimonial.position: Founder, Camino el Portal del Alma

stories.title: Nopa - Intelligent Automation
stories.challenge: Required intelligent automation for catalog management with ETL format, processing large volumes of data efficiently.
stories.solution: We developed a custom solution with BuildShip and bespoke plugin that completely automates the catalog ETL process.

testimonial.quote: The automation they created completely transformed our workflow. What used to take days now happens in minutes.
testimonial.author: Nicolas Mallo

stories.title: Mini Universo - Total Rebranding
stories.challenge: Needed complete brand rebranding and platform preparation for upcoming franchise automation launch.
stories.solution: We executed comprehensive WordPress rebranding and developed HITLS automation system for franchise management with BuildShip.

testimonial.quote: The rebranding exceeded all my expectations. The new identity perfectly reflects the expansion vision we have for Mini Universo.
testimonial.author: Marcos Utrera

stories.title: Tatua - Italian-Venezuelan Emotional Connection
stories.challenge: Create a clothing brand with strong emotional connection and complete automation for catalog management and social media.
stories.solution: WordPress + WooCommerce platform development with BuildShip automation for Print on Demand and collection management.

testimonial.quote: I'm excited about the launch. The platform perfectly captures the Italian-Venezuelan essence I wanted to convey.
testimonial.author: Mauro Cavallo

stories.title: Armeni - Armenian-Uruguayan Heritage
stories.challenge: Develop clothing brand with Armenian-Uruguayan DNA following similar strategy to Tatua but with unique cultural identity.
stories.solution: Twin platform implementation with Armenian cultural customization and complete commercial process automation.

testimonial.quote: The proposal respects and celebrates our Armenian roots in a way I never imagined possible on a digital platform.
testimonial.author: Rafael Boghtchumian

stories.title: Quantum Biohacking - Toroidal Codex
stories.challenge: Create a toroidal codex based on book and quantum deck, integrating quantum physics, neurosciences, ancestral wisdom and co-creative AI.
stories.solution: Development of innovative platform combining ancestral knowledge with quantum technology and applied neurosciences.

testimonial.quote: We're creating something revolutionary that unites millennial wisdom with the most advanced quantum technology.
testimonial.author: Runa Quantum

stories.title: Tatua - Italian-Venezuelan Emotional Connection
stories.challenge: Create a clothing brand with strong emotional connection and complete automation for catalog management and social media.
stories.solution: WordPress + WooCommerce platform development with BuildShip automation for Print on Demand and collection management.

testimonial.quote: I'm excited about the launch. The platform perfectly captures the Italian-Venezuelan essence I wanted to convey.
testimonial.author: Mauro Cavallo

stories.title: Armeni - Armenian-Uruguayan Heritage
stories.challenge: Develop clothing brand with Armenian-Uruguayan DNA following similar strategy to Tatua but with unique cultural identity.
stories.solution: Twin platform implementation with Armenian cultural customization and complete commercial process automation.

testimonial.quote: The proposal respects and celebrates our Armenian roots in a way I never imagined possible on a digital platform.
testimonial.author: Rafael Boghtchumian

blogSection.title: Demystifying Technology
blogSection.subtitle: Practical and accessible knowledge for entrepreneurs who want to understand technology without getting lost in technicalities. Your technology ally explains the complex in simple terms.

posts.title: Why your website needs to be more than pretty?
posts.description: Discover why a successful website goes beyond visual design and how technology strategy can transform your business.

posts.title: Automation: Your best employee that never sleeps
posts.description: How automation can free up your time to focus on what really matters in your entrepreneurship.

posts.title: Next.js explained for entrepreneurs

posts.description: The UX design principles that really matter to convert visitors into paying customers.
